text: Accident just happened along Enugu-Onitsha expressway. 3 cars involved. Traffic dey mad. #Enugu #NigeriaRoads
Armed robbers block Aba road last night near Osisioma. Person wey dey travel be careful o. #Aba #Safety
Serious hold up for Umuahia road, no accident but police checkpoint dey cause wahala. #Umuahia
Ụzọ Aba ruo Umuahia juru potholes. Ekwela ka ị gawa n’abalị. #Igbo #Southeast
False alarm o, dem talk say kidnappers dey Awgu road but na lie. I just pass there now, road dey free. #Awgu
Huge trailer fall for Okigwe junction scatter everywhere. Abeg avoid that road. #Okigwe
I see burning tanker along Onitsha-Owerri road. Danger zone! #Onitsha
No dey use Enugu-Abakiliki express this morning, flood don carry road. #FloodAlert
Ụmụ okada na-eti mmadụ ego n’Ogidi road. Ana m asị unu jisie ike ma bụrụ ndị nche. #Ogidi
BREAKING: Gunshots reported near Nnewi yesterday night. Travelers advised to avoid that axis till further notice. #Nnewi #TravelAlert
Fuel tanker dey block part of Enugu-Abakaliki express. Na only one lane dey move. #Traffic
Abeg dem say robbery happen for Nsukka road but I think na fake gist. I pass today nothing dey. #Nsukka
Ụzọ Owerri gara Onitsha juru traffic, ndị police na-ejide ego. #Owerri #Onitsha
Heavy accident at Aba express involving a bus and keke. Avoid route if possible. #Accident
Police checkpoint after Ugwuoba dey collect too much. Na dem cause delay. #Enugu
Ọkụ dara n’Ụli road, mmadụ abụọ merụọ ahụ. O di egwu. #Igbo
People dey say kidnappers dey Umuahia axis, but abeg I pass there 2day nothing happen. #Rumor
Avoid Onitsha head bridge now, traffic locked due to tanker accident. #Onitsha
Ụgbọ agha juru n’Ụzọ Abakaliki, ndị mmadụ na-atụ ụjọ. #Abakaliki
False alert making rounds on WhatsApp say accident kill 20 for Awka, abeg fake news. #Awka
Trailer spoil for Udi road, vehicles dey turn back. Expect delay. #Enugu
Ụmụ okada kwụsịrị ụzọ na Nkpor axis, akpọrọ ndị police. #Nkpor
Armed robbery confirmed last night along Ihiala road. 2 buses attacked. #Ihiala
Somebody dey spread gist say expressway near Abia collapse but na lie. Road still dey solid. #Abia
Checkpoint wahala between Okigwe and Umuahia again. Same story everyday. #Okigwe
Ọnwụ mere n’Ụzọ Nsukka n’ihi nnukwu ụgbọ ala gbajiri. Chukwu nyere anyi aka. #Nsukka
Heavy rain dey scatter road for Orlu axis, abeg slow down. #Orlu
Ụzọ Owerri ruo Aba na-eyi egwu, ọtụtụ ụmụ nwoke na-egbochi ụgbọala. #Owerri
Another crash at Enugu-Abakaliki road this morning. People injured. #Accident
Dem say Aba road free today, no robbery. #GoodNews
